New Wallpaper Downloading wallpaper … Unable to download wallpaper Wallpaper download cancelled Wallpaper saved to Wallpaper with name %s already exist, do you want to replace it? Replace Create New
No application to open image Loading wallpaper … Applying wallpaper … Wallpaper applied Unable to apply wallpaper Wallpaper apply cancelled Unable to fetch data from server Set as Wallpaper Wallpaper scroll will forced to enable if you apply from this option
Enable Wallpaper Scroll Dashboard will apply wallpaper based on the original resolution of the wallpaper. If your launcher supports scrollable wallpapers, the wallpaper will scroll when you swipe left or right changing your home screen. Disable Wallpaper Scroll Dashboard will apply wallpaper based on current view of wallpaper. Drag to left or right to adjust wallpaper. Pinch or double tap to zoom wallpaper.
Data & Cache Clear Cache Remove image cache from your storage, created when picking an image from this app, requesting missing apps, and after loading cloud wallpaper thumbnails. Cache Size : Do you really want to clear cache? Cache cleared Clear Icon Request Data Remove icon request data, created after requesting missing apps from icon request. Do you really want to clear icon request data? Icon request data cleared

CandyBar CandyBar is open source icon pack dashboard for Android available at GitHub and free to use, developed by Dani Mahardhika. \n\nCopyright © 2014-2016 Google+ https://plus.google.com/u/1/+DaniMahardhika GitHub https://github.com/danimahardhika
